title: Child shot by young brother, teen charged
content:
A 4-year-old was injured when she was accidentally shot by her 5-year-old brother Sunday afternoon in Trigg County.
Deputies were called to 5589 Caledonia Road after the shooting. The child was taken to Trigg County Hospital, then flown to an Evansville, Indiana, hospital, said Trigg County Sheriff Ray Burnam.
